title: CS Competency Practical Skill Enhancement: Innovation-Oriented Project Design for Collaborative Creative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete at least one creative collaborative project analyzing social issues
Learners can execute peer feedback-based idea development processes using digital tools at least three times
Learners can present two or more case studies of resolving conflicts arising during knowledge creation through collaborative strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
